.. _dg.tim2lino:

=============================================
``tim2lino`` : importing legacy data from TIM
=============================================

.. currentmodule:: lino_xl.lib.tim2lino

This plugin is used to import legacy data from a TIM database.

See :mod:`lino_xl.lib.tim2lino`.

Plugin settings:

.. data:: ignore_diffs_below

See :attr:`lino_xl.lib.tim2lino.Plugin.ignore_diffs_below`
